segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying dishes, focused intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unseen by her, water overflows from the sink basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It pours steadily, creating hazards on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, engage in sneaky fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balances on the unstable stool toward the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the cookie jar is triumphant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the tilt of the stool spells potential trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl waits below, arm up in hopeful gesture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their cooperation is adorable amid the peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside garden through the window is picture-perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet here, water damage looms without notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I dislike how oblivious everyone seems to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
